profile.about:
Ever since a kid, I've always been passionated and very curious about engineering and technology. That lead me to learn from various sources from academic to internet tutorials about software engineering, cybersecurity engineering and obtained a degree in Information Technology.

Since then, I've grown to be a seasoned, hard worker, skilled problem solver and a continuous learner with:

  • 10+ years of experience in Web development
  • 5+ years of experience in Android development
  • 5+ years of experience in API development
  • 2+ years of experience in Leadership
  • 1+ year of experience in Product management
